name: Ogame AdBlock all Domains --NEW--
description:
This Style blocks every Premium stuff.
Furthermore the links Merchant, Board,
Officers Recruitment, Help, Rules and
Legal Notice are removed.

Dieser Style entfernt alle Premium Funktionen.
Außerdem werden die Links, Forum, Hilfe,
Regeln und Impressum ausgebledet.

Notice:
This Script is written for the domain "ogame.de". If you play on another domain, you can change it
